name: Kitty
description: DPK is a decentralized play-to-earn platform which created a Metaverse of games featuring with Kitties. Only users who owns at least one Kitty NFT can have access to the game and enjoy the combination of gameplays and finance such as guild building (clans), NFT, GameFi and play-to-earn. The goal of DPK is to establish a gaming platform that is fun and innovative.
